data.value: Your changes will be saved automatically.

data.value: This app needs access to your location

data.value: Warning: We couldn't read your current theme.

updateInfoText
data.value: We check for updates at every program start.

data.name: welcomeText
data.value: Change settings here to modify the automatic theme switch behavior.

data.name: restartNeeded
data.value: App restart required to see changes

data.name: dbErrorText
data.value: Maybe your picture file is corrupted or the path doesn't exist.

data.name: dbPreviewError
data.value: We couldn't generate a preview of your image, sorry!

data.name: dbSavedError
data.value: We couldn't save your settings, sorry!

data.name: cbAccentColor
data.value: Only visible in dark mode. If you run into issues: please increase the switching delay in settings.

data.name: ErrorMessageBox
data.value:
There was an issue with the UI.
Please ensure: - the service is running - your config.yaml file is correct
Would you like to create an issue on the Auto Dark Mode repository? Click "Yes" to open a new browser window.

data.name: cbConnectedStandbyTooltip
data.value: Mobile devices, like Microsoft Surface products, are using a new kind of standby mode. Enabling this option makes sure that Auto Dark Mode immediately switches the theme after waking up your computer. But it also reduces the battery life, so ONLY activate if necessary!

data.name: msgBatterySaver
data.value: Due to a Windows bug, the taskbar doesn't properly switch its color in battery saver mode. Please turn off battery saver if you run into issues.

data.name: ToolTipDisabledDueTheme
data.value: These options are disabled while using a Windows Theme. You can set them up individually in your Windows Theme.

data.name: ThemeTutorialStep1
data.value: Click here to open Windows Theme settings.

data.name: ThemeTutorialStep2
data.value: Now navigate to 'Colors' and change the system color to 'Light' for the light theme. Select your favorite Wallpaper, Mouse Cursor and Accent Color.

data.name: ThemeTutorialStep3
data.value: Go back to theme settings and save your theme.

data.name: ThemeTutorialStep4
data.value: Repeat this process for the dark theme.

data.name: cbSettingsLogonTask
data.value: Use logon task instead of startup entry

data.name: ThemeApplyError1
data.value: Error occurred while applying the selected themes, we disabled theme switching

data.name: tbDarkReaderDescription
data.value: This browser extension makes websites in Chrome, Firefox and Edge respect the system theme.

data.name: DonationPayPalDescription
data.value: You can send me money via PayPal. It's completely voluntary and you shouldn't expect any compensation.

data.name: donationDescription
data.value:
Hello! Thank you for using Auto Dark Mode! Do you like it so far?
This app makes your everyday more pleasant, by helping you take care of your eyes. At the same time it's completely free, ad-free, doesn't collect user data and it's open source. I don't generate any profit with this project.
For this reason you could support me with a voluntary donation. Even a small amount makes me jumping happy through my apartment. Just donate as much as you value my work.

data.name: ThemeApplyError2
data.value: Error occured while applying a .theme-file. Maybe your created theme got deleted or moved. This is why we deactivated theme switching for now. To re-enable it, please open Auto Dark Mode and configure {0} Settings.

data.value: This feature is disabled while Auto Dark Mode manages your theme.

data.name: tbPickTheme
data.value: Select a different Windows theme for dark and light mode respectively. Allows full theme customization, but requires you to set up .theme files on your own.

data.name: tbPickWallpaper
data.value: Customize your desktop wallpaper for all monitors, individual monitors, set a background color or enable spotlight.

data.name: tbUpdates
data.value: We check for new versions of Auto Dark Mode in the background. When an update is available, we will notify you via toast notification

data.value: Please check service.log and updater.log for infos

data.name: UpdateToastDowngradeAvailable
data.comment: MUST contain the placerholder string!! That's where the version number is injected.

data.name: ColorizationTextBlockDescription
data.value: Customize the Windows system color scheme to your liking.

data.name: WallpaperTextBlockPosition
data.value: Choose a fit for your desktop image

data.name: SettingsPageCheckBoxAlwaysRefreshDwm
data.value: Always refresh DWM on theme switch

data.name: SettingsPageCheckBoxAlwaysRefreshDwmExplanation
data.value:
Attempts to reduce the occurrence of wrong UI colors in the explorer, taskbar and start menu. If you experience this often or are bothered by it, try enabling this setting.
This may introduce slight to moderate lag on some systems during theme switch similar to how it happened in Windows 10. On rare occasions, Windows may emit a beeping sound when the mouse is moved during DWM refreshes.

data.name: PersonalizationPageCursorDescription
data.value: Configure different mouse cursors for dark and light modes.

data.name: PersonalizationPageManagedMode
data.value: Let Auto Dark Mode manage my theme

data.name: CursorsPageOpenPointerSettingsDescription
data.value: You can define new cursor schemes in the Windows settings and then select them here afterwards.

data.name: SwitchModesCheckBoxProcessBlockList
data.value: Don't switch while certain processes are running

data.name: RecommendedAppsButton
data.value: Browse apps with Auto Dark Mode support

data.name: RecommendedAppsDescription
data.value: Not every third party app supports Auto Dark Mode by default. On our wiki page we provide a curated list with supported apps.

data.name: DonationGitHubSponsorsDescription
data.value: Alternatively you can donate via GitHub Sponsors, which also supports recurring monthly donations.
